job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pAlbin Engineering Services Inc wwwaesicom is looking for a Software Engineer for one of our premier clients in the San Jose CA area This is a permanent position with full benefitsppbrppJob ResponsibilitiespulliDesign Failure Analysis tools by solving control equipment problemsliliDesign and test software on Microsoft Windows Environment to control the operation of automated microscope and scanning systemsliliDesign and implement software for acquiring images from framegrabber data and camera systemsliulpJob RequirementspulliBachelors Degree in Computer Science or similarlili2 years experience with Visual Studiolili2 years experience developing in C and C language to developdebug Windows desktop applicationliliKnowledge and experience of WPFliliUnderstanding of Semiconductor devices and software development experience in Microscope and Semiconductor probing tools is highly desirableliul
